parameters: But in the end, you reign victorious.
Don't just change moods so suddenly.
It's a bad way to say it, but yes.
I thought you would get mad at me.
You think I get angry for no reason, dimwit?
It just seemed that way with Miss Luora...
You in cahoots with each other?
It's just that it seemed to be going that way...
...and, well, it's not like we're strangers
to Miss Luora. That's why I became a little
I've told them before that they're not allowed
She can't complain if I ignore her after all that.
They... You mean the Lords of Reason?
I'm a Lord Candidate, you see...
Um, allow me to introduce myself.
I'm Ino, and I just came to this world recently──
──Right now, I'm on a journey among the stars,
and I'm also entrusted with the duty of the Mana Vessels.
So that's why you had to meet me?
Is it okay if I take it?
But, why are you guys the one doing it?
Can't Tahati just do it herself?
I mean, she just visited and all...
Well, since we originally asked to do this,
maybe she just gave us the opportunity?
No, that's what Luora asked us to do.
...I wonder if Miss Luora is okay.
She seemed like she had something important to say...
It's probably some bullshit she cooked up again.
Do you think you know Luora well enough?
Even if she had valid reason──
Would she go to the effort of disguising herself
and then ruining my festival just to get my attention?
But the reality is she did.
If she needed anything, she just had to tell me.
Like I said, didn't she do all that
to get to talk to you?
All of the Lords of Reason have been forbidden
from entering my domain from the beginning.
...That is to say, she would've attracted
my attention the moment she set foot here.
That is, if she hadn't disguised herself.
But she didn't do that, and even more so,
she trampled upon my work and angered me.
Do you know what this means for her?
She... didn't want to meet you, Miss Kann'ryuua?
She never wanted to meet me in the first place.
W-what do you mean by that?
Fail to meet me, that is.
It's almost as if meeting Kann'ryuua was
an act not of her own volition.
Maybe there was a meaning in destroying
To summarize, what is Luora doing right now?
Or perhaps pretending to cooperate with that someone.
But what's definitely correct is that she's
planning to stir up something messy.
However, I don't think you need to worry about her.
I just hope the issue can be resolved with strength.
In any case, we don't know where she is.
Trying to deal with her is not going to
And to think... you'd be so thoughtful,
I had assumed your anger towards Miss Luora was
on impulse, but to think you've thought it this far...
You thought I was some barbaric fish-brain or something?
It's just... you seemed scary at the time.
I prefer it if people think like that.
That's why I get angry over the little things.
I have made a severe lapse in judgement.
hasn't said anything for a while now.
...So, she wishes to meet Miss Kann because...
Ah, so that's how it is.
Succubi like that appear from time to time.
She really just wanted to meet Kann?
Well, this is a rare opportunity.
So enjoy yourself with every fiber
What do you wanna know about?
罰としてあたしに犯されろ。
まあいい。別に何もなくてもイノは犯すからな。
それより準備はいいんだろうな？
さらっと問題発言をしたぞ。
……その、死忘れのオヴィトリ……でしたっけ。
そこはここから近いのでしょうか？
だけど心配すんな、一瞬で着く。
翼の理で移動できる感じか？
もっといい方法がある。
正直、もやもやも残ってるんだが……
あたしは自分の意思でこの世界に残ったし、
そのことに満足もしてる。
何を忘れようが関係ねえ。
私たちは帰っていいか？
待て待て、せっかく来たんだ。
こ、このでけー建物にか？
あたしの家だし、誰も文句は言わねえ。
それじゃあ、お言葉に甘えて……
ただし、イノはあたしのベッドで寝ろ。
……せっかくですが、やっぱりアイノアに戻ります。
たっぷり可愛がってやるよ♥
ここから出ましょうか。
シーン『歓楽街のママ』を閲覧しますか？
\C[17]※いずれの選択でも回想に登録されます。\C[0]
